price: Janganlah kamu kira bahwa orang-orang yang kafir itu dapat melemahkan (Allah dari mengazab mereka) di bumi ini, sedang tempat tinggal mereka (di akhirat) adalah neraka.  Dan sungguh amat jeleklah tempat kembali itu.
arabic: لَا تَحۡسَبَنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ مُعۡجِزِينَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ وَمَأۡوَىٰهُمُ ٱلنَّارُۖ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَصِيرُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: lā taḥsabanna alladhīna kafarū muʿ'jizīna fī al-arḍi wamawāhumu al-nāru walabi'sa al-maṣīru
